About us

let’s talk!
Empowering businesses to reach new heights

Gibson CRE delivers expert insights and strategic guidance to help our clients make informed decisions in the commercial real estate market.

GIBSON CRE

Leadership

Founded in Boston's South End in 1962, Gibson Associates has expanded to become the leader of luxury residential real estate sales throughout Greater Boston. Evenutally transitioning to the Sotheby's International Realty brand in 2006, the brokerage has established itself as the top Massachusetts-based company by sales volume and continues to deliver the highest average sale price of any firm.
